How To Install Plugin:

You need to have Firebug installed on Firefox.
Go to project webpage - http://sirmasolutions.com/products/ml-firefox-console
Click the green button "Add to Firefox' and the plugin will start installing. 
Rebooting Firefox is needed after successful completion. 
After the reboot a new tab 'ConcoleML' will be visible in Firebug. 
Open it and click on the Log link to setup your log configuration. 
Please check 'Help' for additional information.
